verses.verse: The men <WH376> of Ephraim <WH669> were gathered together, <WH6817> and passed <WH5674> northward; <WH6828> and they said <WH559> to Jephthah, <WH3316> "Why did you pass over <WH5674> to fight <WH3898> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and didn't <WH7121> call us to go <WH3212> with you? <WH8313> We will burn your house <WH1004> around you with fire! <WH784>"

Jephthah <WH3316> said <WH559> to them, <WH5971> "I and my people were <WH1961> at great <WH3966> strife <WH376> with the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983> and when I called <WH2199> you, <WH3467> you didn't save me out of their hand. <WH3027>

When I saw <WH7200> that you didn't <WH3467> save me, <WH7760> I put my life <WH5315> in my hand, <WH3709> and passed over <WH5674> against the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and Yahweh <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into my hand. <WH3027> Why then have you come up <WH5927> to me this day, <WH3117> to fight against me? <WH3898>"

Then Jephthah <WH3316> gathered together <WH6908> all the men <WH582> of Gilead, <WH1568> and fought <WH3898> with Ephraim; <WH669> and the men <WH582> of Gilead <WH1568> struck <WH5221> Ephraim, <WH669> because they said, <WH559> "You are fugitives <WH6412> of Ephraim, <WH669> you Gileadites, <WH1568> in the midst <WH8432> of Ephraim, <WH669> and in the midst <WH8432> of Manasseh. <WH4519>"

The Gileadites <WH1568> took <WH3920> the fords <WH4569> of the Jordan <WH3383> against the Ephraimites. <WH669> It was so, <WH6412> that when the fugitives of Ephraim <WH669> said, <WH559> "Let me go over, <WH5674>" the men <WH582> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> to him, <WH673> "Are you an Ephraimite?" If he said, <WH559> "No;"

then they said <WH559> to him, <WH559> "Now say <WH7641> 'Shibboleth;'" and he said <WH559> "Sibboleth; <WH5451>" for he couldn't <WH3559> manage to pronounce <WH1696> it right: <WH3559> then they siezed <WH270> him, <WH7819> and killed him at the fords <WH4569> of the Jordan. <WH3383> At that time, <WH6256> forty <WH705> - two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> of Ephraim <WH669> fell. <WH5307>

Jephthah <WH3316> judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> six <WH8337> years. <WH8141> Then Jephthah <WH3316> the Gileadite <WH1569> died, <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in the cities <WH5892> of Gilead. <WH1568>
After <WH310> him Ibzan <WH78> of Bethlehem <WH1035> judged <WH8199> Israel. <WH3478>

He had thirty <WH7970> sons; <WH1121> and thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323> he sent <WH7971> abroad, <WH2351> and thirty <WH7970> daughters <WH1323> he brought <WH935> in from abroad <WH2351> for his sons. <WH1121> He judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>
Ibzan <WH78> died, <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> at Bethlehem. <WH1035>
After <WH310> him Elon <WH356> the Zebulunite <WH2075> judged <WH8199> Israel; <WH3478> and he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> ten <WH6235> years. <WH8141>
Elon <WH356> the Zebulunite <WH2075> died, <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in Aijalon <WH357> in the land <WH776> of Zebulun. <WH2074>
After <WH310> him Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985> the Pirathonite <WH6553> judged <WH8199> Israel. <WH3478>

He had forty <WH705> sons <WH1121> and thirty <WH7970> sons <WH1121>' sons, who rode <WH7392> on seventy <WH7657> donkey colts: <WH5895> and he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> eight <WH8083> years. <WH8141>

Abdon <WH5658> the son <WH1121> of Hillel <WH1985> the Pirathonite <WH6553> died, <WH4191> and was buried <WH6912> in Pirathon <WH6552> in the land <WH776> of Ephraim, <WH669> in the hill <WH2022> country of the Amalekites. <WH6003>
